parts.name: item
parts.prose: Notify terminated individuals of applicable, legally binding post-employment requirements for the protection of organizational information; and

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Require terminated individuals to sign an acknowledgment of post-employment requirements as part of the organizational termination process.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Organizations consult with the Office of the General Counsel regarding matters of post-employment requirements on terminated individuals.
